ABM (Account-Based Marketing)

750K+

Company Locations*

Determine the number of companies that meet your ideal criteria with. Our Company Profiles include detailed and relevant account information such as products installed, contacts within those accounts, contact information and a visual functional organizational chart, mapping all the contacts within an account into departments and functions. This allows you to get as high-level and granular as needed.

9M+ ADDITIONAL COMPANIES WORLDWIDE †

PBM (People-Based Marketing)

28M+

Most Searched Personas*

Speak directly to that key decision maker with our robust database of 28 million contacts. Our Contact Profiles include detailed contact information such as title, business email, phone number, contact department, contact role, seniority and products used. We can not only tell you which technologies are installed at companies, but also the people who are using that product within the company.

300M+ ADDITIONAL CONTACTS †

TBM (Tech-Stack Based Marketing)

9M+

Installed Technologies*

We track 43K+ products installed across multiple industries. With one of the most intuitive product categorization and kick-ass search, you can quickly get valuable insights on key accounts and prospects. Market with precision at scale and sell with much higher chances of closing the deal. You can view an organization’s hardware and software stack, tracked to location level.

110M+ ADDITIONAL INSTALLED TECHNOLOGIES †
